definition[0]: the activity of deciding how to advertise a product, what price to charge for it etc, or the type of job in which you do this
example[1]: Company sales improved dramatically following a $2 million marketing campaign.
example[2]: a career in sales and marketing
example[3]: Cushman is director of marketing for a chain of Italian restaurants.
definition[1]: activities to design and sell a product or service by considering buyers’ wants or needs, for example where and how they will buy it, how much they will be willing to pay etc
example[5]: They’re going to have to spend even more on sales and marketing to win customers back.
example[6]: Successful innovations need to couple R&D, manufacturing, and marketing activities.
